Posts.Content: I have a big problem after lumpectomy surgery.  I need suggestion on were to buy a bra for one c breast and one dd breast size.  I'm getting alot of skin brake down on the c side because the breast goes south and the dd with under wire is up and of the under skin.  If I coud find a bra that is half c and half dd that would be grate!!
Posts.Title: irregular bra size
